page.title: 19STEWARTON'S FASHIONS
page.content: Around the town and in the countryside many people have taken to jogging and a few of the joggers have entered the Ayr Half Marathon and the Glasgow Marathon. Young people enjoy pop music and some may be seen walking around listening on a walkman or to a large transistor to their favourite singers. There are a few who dress in punk clothes and have way out styles but in the main the young people wear the popular light coloured fashion clothes. The older woman who prefers more expensive exclusive clothes may buy them in Jen McLeod's in Brown Street. The people in the countryside tend to wear conventional fashions of trousers or skirts and Pringle knitwear or other casual clothes. Farmers' weddings are very fashionable affairs.
